name: Camp Demise (LD50)
description:
This game was created for Ludum Dare 50. The theme was 'Delay the Inevitable'. Check it out here!

You have wandered deep into an abandoned campground called Camp Demise and now you are lost. There are stories of campers who have gone missing and talk of a shadowy creature that lurks in the trees. Use your flashlight to DELAY the monster's attack.

Can you escape death or is it INEVITABLE?

Gamepad Supported! 

  • A (Button South): Interact
  • Left Stick: Movement 

Keyboard and Mouse: 

  • E: Interact
  • WASD or Arrow Keys: Movement
